question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "This is complementary to prior falsenegative control work and different in scope from multilabel FPlimited set prediction"?

question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "We instantiate the nested sets through standard antiextensive morphological operators and sigmoidscore thresholding"?
